At the Window

Sonia looks anxious, standing by the window.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “You have no reason to be uneasy.”  
Sonia: “I think you are right.”  

---  

Pyotr Petrovitch sits opposite Sonia, serious and dignified.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “Will you make my excuses to your mother?”  
Sonia: “Yes, I’ll tell her… at once.”  

---  

Sonia stands, nervous and hurried.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “Wait, that’s not all…”  
Sonia: “What do you mean?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch expresses his apologies to Sonia for missing dinner and reveals he has another purpose for their meeting.
